protocol_name: Bead Beating RNA extraction from 25 mm filter
protocol_name_html: Bead Beating RNA extraction from 25 mm filter
documents: {"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bbqdajw.docx","file_id":"1070","thumb_url":"/img/extensions/docx.png","ofn":"Bead Beating RNA Extraction from 25 mm Filter_BCN.docx"}
description: This protocol is for extracting RNA from 25 mm filters and can be used with filters stored in RNAlater for preservation. This protocol has been tested with 0.22 μm pore size Durapore filters. Custom synthesized RNA transcript standards are added at the time of extraction and are recovered post-sequencing for quantitative metatranscriptome analysis (Satinsky et al., 2013).
before_start: Have the following on hand in addition to materials: forceps, 2.0 and 1.5 ml RNase free tubes, temperature controlled microcentrifuge, vortex with 2.0 ml adaptors, 21g1 needls, and 3 ml syringes.

materials.reagent_name: Glass beads, acid-washed, 425-600 μm (30-40 U.S. sieve)
Ethyl alcohol, Pure 200 proof, for molecular biology

warning: Proper sterile technique when handling samples and reagents is critical at every step to prevent introducing RNases that will degrade RNA samples.
guidelines:
Reference:

Satinsky BM, Gifford SM, Crump BC, Moran MA (2013) Use of internal standards for quantitative metatranscriptome and metagenome analysis. Meth Enzymol, ed DeLong EF (Academic, Burlington, MA), Vol 531, pp 237–250

source_data.description: Turn on 4°C centrifuge
Thaw internal standards on ice

components.data: Set up 2.0 ml tube adaptor on Mo Bio Vortex Genie 2.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Set up 2.0 ml tube adaptor on Mo Bio Vortex Genie 2.

components.data: For each sample, prepare a 2.0 ml tube with the following 3-bead mixture: 200 μl 0.1 mm zirconium beads, 100 μl 0.4-0.6 mm glass beads, 100 μl 0.5 mm zirconium beads
components.name: Description

source_data.description: For each sample, prepare a 2.0 ml tube with the following 3-bead mixture: 200 μl 0.1 mm zirconium beads, 100 μl 0.4-0.6 mm glass beads, 100 μl 0.5 mm zirconium beads
200 μl 0.1 mm zirconium beads
100 μl 0.4-0.6 mm glass beads
100 μl 0.5 mm zirconium beads

components.data: Add Ambion Denaturation Solution to each tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add Ambion Denaturation Solution to each tube

components.data: To each bead tube, add internal standards to reach ~0.5% of expected RNA yield
components.name: Description

source_data.description: To each bead tube, add internal standards to reach ~0.5% of expected RNA yield

components.data: Place one 25 mm sample filter into each bead tube using RNase-free forceps
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place one 25 mm sample filter into each bead tube using RNase-free forceps

components.data: Place sample tubes on vortex adaptor and beat for 5 min
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place sample tubes on vortex adaptor and beat for 5 min

components.data: Switch tube positions and beat another 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Switch tube positions and beat another 5 min.

components.data: Centrifuge sample tubes for 1 min at 5000 rpm at 4°C
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge sample tubes for 1 min at 5000 rpm at 4°C

components.data: Transfer as much of the RNA lysate as possible to a new 1.5 ml centrifuge tube (Can carryover some beads)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer as much of the RNA lysate as possible to a new 1.5 ml centrifuge tube (Can carryover some beads)

components.data: Centrifuge RNA tubes for 5 min at 5000 rpm at 4°C
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge RNA tubes for 5 min at 5000 rpm at 4°C

components.data: Transfer lysate to new 2.0 ml tube (Do not carry over any beads).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer lysate to new 2.0 ml tube (Do not carry over any beads).

components.data: Add 1 volume of 100% ethanol to the lysate
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1 volume of 100% ethanol to the lysate

source_data.reagent_name: Ethyl alcohol, Pure 200 proof, for molecular biology

components.data: Draw the RNA lysate up into a 3.0 ml syringe with a 21g1 gauge needle and pass it back out 8 times to shear RNA
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Draw the RNA lysate up into a 3.0 ml syringe with a 21g1 gauge needle and pass it back out 8 times to shear RNA

components.data: Apply 700 μL of RNA lysate to RNeasy mini column
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Apply 700 μL of RNA lysate to RNeasy mini column

components.data: Close tube gently and centrifuge 15 sec at 13000 rpm
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Close tube gently and centrifuge 15 sec at 13000 rpm
Discard flow-through.

components.data: Repeat steps 16-18 until entire sample has been applied to column.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Repeat steps 16-18 until entire sample has been applied to column.

components.data: Add 700 μl Buffer RW1 to RNeasy Mini spin column.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 700 μl Buffer RW1 to RNeasy Mini spin column.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 20 of Bead Beating RNA extraction from 25 mm filter
source_data.protocol_name: Bead Beating RNA extraction from 25 mm filter
source_data.protocol_name_html: Bead Beating RNA extraction from 25 mm filter
source_data.annotation: Here we are continuing to following Qiagen RNeasy Mini kit (step5 of Qiagen manual); finishing with two sequential elutions and spins of 35 μ
source_data.thread_text: Here we are continuing to following Qiagen RNeasy Mini kit (step5 of Qiagen manual); finishing with two sequential elutions and spins of 35 μ
source_data.body: Here we are continuing to following Qiagen RNeasy Mini kit (step5 of Qiagen manual); finishing with two sequential elutions and spins of 35 μ

components.data: Centrifuge for 15 sec at 13000 rpm. Discard the flow-through.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge for 15 sec at 13000 rpm. Discard the flow-through.

components.data: Add 500 μl Buffer RPE to RNeasy spin column.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 500 μl Buffer RPE to RNeasy spin column.

components.data: Centrifuge for 15 sec at 13000 rpm. Discard flow-through.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge for 15 sec at 13000 rpm. Discard flow-through.

components.data: Add 500 μl Buffer RPE to RNeasy spin column.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 500 μl Buffer RPE to RNeasy spin column.
Centrifuge for 2 min at 13000 rpm

components.data: Place column in new 2.0 ml collection tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place column in new 2.0 ml collection tube.
Centrifuge for 1 min at 13000 rpm

components.data: Place column in a new 1.5 ml sterile tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place column in a new 1.5 ml sterile tube

components.data: Add 35 μl RNase-free water directly onto filter and close the lid.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 35 μl RNase-free water directly onto filter and close the lid.

components.data: Incubate tube for 1 min at room temperature
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate tube for 1 min at room temperature
Centrifuge for 1 min at 13000 rpm.

components.data: Add another 35 μl RNase-free water into same column/tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add another 35 μl RNase-free water into same column/tube

components.data: Incubate for 1 min at room temperature
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate for 1 min at room temperature
Centrifuge for 1 min at 13000 rpm

components.data: Discard column and place tube with RNA on ice
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard column and place tube with RNA on ice

components.data: Quantify extracted RNA with Nanodrop (2 μl)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Quantify extracted RNA with Nanodrop (2 μl)

components.data:
Mix the following in a 1.5 ml tube:
component amount
extracted sample 50 μl
RNase-free water 40 μl
DNase reaction buffer 10 μl
Turbo DNase 3 μl
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Mix the following in a 1.5 ml tube:
component amount
extracted sample 50 μl
RNase-free water 40 μl
DNase reaction buffer 10 μl
Turbo DNase 3 μl
Incubate for 20 min at 37 °C

components.data: Add 3 μl more Turbo DNase to sample
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 3 μl more Turbo DNase to sample
Incubate an additional 20 min at 37 °C

components.data: Add 20 μl inactivation solution to sample (make sure solution is well mixed)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 20 μl inactivation solution to sample (make sure solution is well mixed)

components.data: Vortex on and off for ~4 min
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Vortex on and off for ~4 min
Spin for 1 min at 13000 rpm

components.data: Carefully, without disturbing inactivation reagent, remove supernatant (~100 μl) into a new 1.5 ml tube and place on ice
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Carefully, without disturbing inactivation reagent, remove supernatant (~100 μl) into a new 1.5 ml tube and place on ice

components.data: Quantify DNased RNA with Nanodrop (2 μl)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Quantify DNased RNA with Nanodrop (2 μl)

components.data: Optional: Clean and concentrate DNased RNA using Zymo RNA Clean & Concentrator-5 according to manufacturer protocol
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Optional: Clean and concentrate DNased RNA using Zymo RNA Clean & Concentrator-5 according to manufacturer protocol
Store RNA at -80 °C
